name: UnderCover Agent (itch) (SK318031)
description:
You’ll play as the Agent SK, an undercover agent with a knack for getting into tricky situations. Use your skills in this ultimate game of espionage to outwit and armed guards! Do you have what it takes to escape without getting caught? Suit up agent, we’ve got a mission!

- Take down security guards and personnel to earn gold.
- Hack computer interfaces, sneak past surveillance cameras and dodge deadly lasers.
- Face off in epic  battles to become the one and only ultimate spy.

We make casual moments turn into mad adventures!

I'm an Indie Developer and I started Working on Games as this was my First Game So Just Forgive me For Bugs and Issues. I  live to tell unique stories and express those in the games I create for players around the world. Play with us and see what’s next!

Looking for the latest fun and more? Check me out on Youtube- https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCM0U-rz7nd0PvN6TSzCZNJg
